column3:
ウオトリー村に住む漁師一家
キキョウは家事に育児に大忙し
今日の晩御飯は
子供たちが大好きな海鮮パエリアだというが
材料が足りないようだ
忙しいキキョウに頼まれ材料をそろえることに
ヤギのバターとマックスサザエを調達してこよう
column4:
Kiana lives in a family of fishermen in
Lurelin Village. She wants to cook her
family's favorite meal, seafood paella,
but she's too busy with her daily errands
and looking after her children to gather
all the necessary ingredients.

Be a sport and help her out by gathering
the ingredients for her. She needs
goat butterand ahearty blueshell snail
to prepare the dish.

column3:
ヤギのバターとマックスサザエを調達し
キキョウに届けた
お礼に海鮮パエリアをおすそ分けしてもらった

/////レシピメモ/////
ヤギのバター マックスサザエ ツルギダイ
岩塩 ハイラル米
column4:
You brought Kiana the goat butter and
hearty blueshell snail required for cooking
seafood paella. She shared some of the dish
with you as thanks!

 \t/////Recipe/////
1 Goat Butter
1 Hearty Blueshell Snail
1 Mighty Porgy
1 Rock Salt
1 Hylian Rice
